title: Goshen Sagas: A Tale of Intrigue and Reconnaissance
description: A Tale of Intrigue and Reconnaissance follows a lone spy as he journeys from the snowy Abimelech Mountain Range to the the River City of Levyt, further still to the island of the Gawei and beyond. The objective of his travels is to gather information on any threats to the League with whatever means required. The spy's first assignment is to gather intel on the recent rumors from the Abimelech. He has recently made his way to the mountain paths on outskirts of the Abimelechs' Great War Hall and now hides in the snow covered brush as he looks for an opportunity to infiltrate the War Hall's walls.
author: Dillon Sapp
